item.description:
A highly interactive session focused on increasing networking skills!

Do you feel awkward at networking events and uncomfortable making new connections? Do you miss opportunities to connect with new donors, community members and colleagues because you donâ€™t know the best way to approach them at events? Do you have trouble ending conversations so you can keep circulating? We will cover the basics of how to work a room, from having the right tools to knowing the best approach to engage prospective donors and collaborators while cultivating community support.

This interactive, fast-paced and fun 90 minute session will be beneficial for seasoned fundraising professionals, non-profit board members, grassroots organizers and anyone interested in creating welcoming community spaces.

Read related blog entries and more
at http://robbiesamuels....


We are so LUCKY to have Robbie at thie event. Robbie is a co-founder of SoJust.org an amazing organization that supports a varieety of socially vital causes. His "Art of the Schmooze" is well known to the networking world as a first-rate, fun informative experience.

So, please join us on the 21st for this great event!
6-8:30 pm (Note: New time!) Plenty of time for networking and practicing the art of the schmooze!





______________________
@robbiesamuels | Facebook | @sojust | www.socializingforjustice.org
Social Networking and Fundraising Tips at www.robbiesamuels.com
item.name: The Art of the Schmooze:
